caption.p: The summary of rodent density, species composition and virus-carrying rate within six surveillance points since 2007 to 2016 a

table-wrap-foot.p: aThe number of rattraps, rats and the individual species were the summation of all surveillance points. Density and virus-carrying rate were the average of all serveillance points. The percentages in brakets represent the proportions of the induvidual species to the all rodents captured in field or residential area
